General.Name: Xining Special Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Xining Special Steel.Co.,Ltd engages in the smelting and rolling of special steel products in China. The company operates through five segments: Real Estate Development and Sales, Coal Mining and Sales, Steelmaking and Rolling, Comprehensive Utilization of Resources, and Commerce and Other. It provides carbon structural steel, carbon engineering steel, composite steel, composite engineering steel, bearing steel, die steel, stainless steel, and spring steel; and hot-rolled bars, forged bars, cold-drawn silver bright material, special-shaped electroslag castings, etc. The company's products are used in automobiles, construction machinery, railways, ships, petrochemicals, mining machinery, coal machinery, new energy, weapons and equipment, aerospace, and other industries. It is also involved in the coal coking; development and operation of mineral products; new technology for smelting, research and development, popularization, and application of new aluminum alloy materials; sale of building materials; and real estate development businesses, as well as provision of iron and steel science and technology research and development, technical consultation, technology transfer, and technology application services. Xining Special Steel.Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Xining, China.
General.Address: No. 52, Qaidam West Road, Xining, China, 810005
